title: How to Make Chinese Chicken Salad with Ramen Noodles

steps.headline: Break up the oriental ramen noodles and set aside.
Add the sugar, vinegar, olive oil and flavor packet from the ramen noodles to a small mixing bowl.
Add the peppers, scallions, unsalted peanuts and other vegetables to a large salad bowl.
Add the cooked chicken and coleslaw.
Pour salad dressing over coleslaw ingredients.
In a large bowl, add peppers, scallions, unsalted peanuts and other vegetables if you like.

text: Rinse cabbage and drain well.  Break up the oriental ramen noodles and set aside.  Add the sugar, vinegar, olive oil and flavor packet from the ramen noodles to a small mixing bowl.  Mix the salad dressing well.  Add the peppers, scallions, unsalted peanuts and other vegetables to a large salad bowl. Mix well. Add the cooked chicken and coleslaw. Mix well. Pour salad dressing over coleslaw ingredients. Mix well. Sprinkle ramen noodles on top. Serve cold. In a large bowl, add peppers, scallions, unsalted peanuts and other vegetables if you like. Add cooked chicken and coleslaw.
